name: Farm.io
description: Farm.io is an educational game that teaches players about rocks, minerals, and soils by having them run a farm. The player must learn how to properly progress in their farm, as each soil has different properties and watering needs, and monsters can only be defeated with a sword made of a harder mineral than they are. My partners and I worked directly with a second grade class to create this game. The learning topics of the game were provided by the teacher, and the students supplied the idea and name of the game.
